markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 340 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Hshurha](/Deities.aspx?ID=103), [Monad](/Deities.aspx?ID=141), [Ragdya](/Deities.aspx?ID=194), [Ragdya](/Deities.aspx?ID=194), [Zura](/Deities.aspx?ID=83)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

The target transforms into a vaporous state. In this state, the target is amorphous. It loses any item bonus to AC and all other effects and bonuses from armor, and it uses its proficiency modifier for unarmored defense. It gains resistance 8 to physical damage and is immune to precision damage. It can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the [attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15) or [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104) trait. It gains a fly Speed of 10 feet and can slip through tiny cracks. The target can Dismiss the spell.
name: Gaseous Form

Turn a willing creature into a flying cloud.
</summary>
summary: Turn a willing creature into a flying cloud.
summary_markdown: Turn a willing creature into a flying cloud.
text: Gaseous Form Source Core Rulebook pg. 340 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Hshurha, Monad, Ragdya, Ragdya, Zura Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 willing creature Duration 5 minutes --- The target transforms into a vaporous state. In this state, the target is amorphous. It loses any item bonus to AC and all other effects and bonuses from armor, and it uses its proficiency modifier for unarmored defense. It gains resistance 8 to physical damage and is immune to precision damage. It can't cast spells, activate items, or use actions that have the attack or manipulate trait. It gains a fly Speed of 10 feet and can slip through tiny cracks. The target can Dismiss the spell.
